member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_MOTION_ESTIMATOR_SEARCH_BLOCK_SIZE
member.summary: Defines search block sizes for video motion estimation.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_MOTION_ESTIMATOR_SEARCH_BLOCK_SIZE.D3D12_VIDEO_MOTION_ESTIMATOR_SEARCH_BLOCK_SIZE_8X8
member.summary: The search block size is 8x8 pixels.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_MOTION_ESTIMATOR_SEARCH_BLOCK_SIZE.D3D12_VIDEO_MOTION_ESTIMATOR_SEARCH_BLOCK_SIZE_16X16
member.summary: The search block size is 16x16 pixels.
